title: BREATHE ON ME, BREATH OF GOD
bible_ref: He breathed on them and said, “Receive the Holy Spirit” John. 20:22
verses: Breathe on me, Breath of God,=Fill me with life anew,=That I may love what Thou dost love,=And do what Thou wouldst do.
Breathe on me, Breath of God,=Until my heart is pure,=Until with Thee I will Thy will,=To do and to endure.
Breathe on me, Breath of God,=Till I am wholly Thine,=Till all this earthly part of me=Glows with Thy fire divine.
Breathe on me, Breath of God,=So shall I never die,=But live with Thee the perfect life=Of Thine eternity.
